description: List of Formula One world champions after Red Bull's Max Verstappen won his third successive title in a Qatar Sprint race on Saturday: Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: List of Formula One world champions
title_page: List of Formula One world champions | The Straits Times
maintext:
List of Formula One world champions after Red Bull's Max Verstappen won his third successive title in a Qatar Sprint race on Saturday:

2021 - Verstappen, Red Bull
2020 - Lewis Hamilton (Britain) Mercedes
2019 - Hamilton, Mercedes
2018 - Hamilton, Mercedes
2017 - Hamilton, Mercedes

2014 - Hamilton, Mercedes

2012 - Vettel, Red Bull
2011 - Vettel, Red Bull
2010 - Vettel, Red Bull
2009 - Jenson Button (Britain) Brawn
2008 - Hamilton, McLaren
2007 - Kimi Raikkonen (Finland) Ferrari

2005 - Alonso, Renault
2004 - Michael Schumacher (Germany) Ferrari

2002 - Schumacher, Ferrari
